entry.title: $1895 // Prime Park Slope Jr 1BED all free utilities/this is REAL so am I catOK
entry.content:
Absolute prime Park Slope and all free utilities. I know this sounds too good to be true - but it's real and so am I.


Half a floor, all for you.

I rented this apt a few times in the last 2 decades. Approval is easy with a decent job and credit.

Contact me soon ASAP if your looking for a great deal and your qualified. Guarantors are no problem if your teetering on eligibility.

Availabity date: Jan 16 or Feb 1. Whatever works for you.

Price may even be negotiable for 'as is' rental.

Junior one bedroom on 6th Ave and Lincoln. This is a great space and priced low.

Sorry, no dogs.
Brad Brown 917-324-0373


18 years renting NYC Apts

entry.title: $2500 // Cozy Quiet Garden Apt Avail March to Oct in Idylic P Slope
entry.content: An exclusive, cozy, beautiful, furnished garden side apt in idylic and historic Park Slope, Brooklyn is available March 1 for 6 months months possibly longer. This is an incredible location and it comes with a yard!!!! Peace and quiet in the building and on the garden side! This will not last! The neighborhood is amazing with wonderful one block away from Food Coop, short walk to many restaurants and shops and Prospect park. 15-20 Min train ride (Q,R,2,3,A) to lower Manhattan and a short walk or bus ride from the LIRR, downtown Brooklyn and Barclay's center. The room is spacious has one bath with tub and shower, with a walk in closet, dresser, a cozy full size bed (You provide bedding and pillows), work desk in living room, chair rolling AC unit, and also includes WiFi. Kitchen is stocked with a new stove. I'm Renting to one person or couple possibly with one good house trained dog. No cats or kids. I am looking for someone who is clean, conscientious, serious, trustworthy who is in NY to either work or study. Strong references are required. The total fee will be $2500 per month includes utilities and internet!
